title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Sen. Ted Cruz & Ezra Levant | 3/25/21
description:
Texas Sen. Ted Cruz joins to discuss the border crisis, face masks, and what he calls the “Corrupt Politicians Act.” More details are out about the Boulder murderer, and we haven’t heard the media use this narrative since the Obama years. Rebel News founder Ezra Levant shares how his news organization was being spied on by the U.S. Navy and Canadian government.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
